comment.author: 25695066@N00
comment._content: That is New York Giants pitcher and Baseball Hall of Famer Christy Mathewson on the left shaking hands with actor (in uniform) William Courtenay. Courtenay was apparently featured in a Broadway play co-written by Mathewson and playwright Rida Johnson Young, entitled "The Girl and the Pennant." The October 13, 1913 New York Times item at the link below states the play featured a cast of seventy people and was to soon open at the Lyric Theatre. query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9806E3DB133FE633A...
